name: LOCOMOTORICA: Staggering Ragdoll
description:
...Have you ever seen these videos where neural networks learn to control physics-based characters?
In LOCOMOTORICA: Staggering Ragdoll, you are the neural network.



You are in control of an active ragdoll in a computer physics simulation. Move your legs manually with gamepad sticks and triggers to retain balance and walk.
You have various tasks to complete:

This game can be challenging at first, as it is partially inspired by QWOP, a 2008 game by Bennett Foddy. But if you get a feel for it, you can walk and navigate the environment with little effort, as demonstrated above.




  • Innovative character controls and physics
  • 30+ challenging hand-crafted tasks
  • Endless procedurally generated levels
  • Steam Leaderboards with replays to race against
  • Level editor and Steam Workshop
  • Relaxing soundtrack


From the creator of Drunken Wrestlers and Drunken Wrestlers 2.
Join my Discord server!
